front.title: CIPID: Contact Information for the Presence Information Data Format

abstract.t: The Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) defines a basic XML format for presenting presence information for a presentity. The Contact Information for the Presence Information Data format (CIPID) is an extension that adds elements to PIDF that provide additional contact information about a presentity and its contacts, including references to address book entries and icons. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
